entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
